test.query: SELECT RegionID, Title FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 4 AND RegionID <= 259 ORDER BY RegionID FORMAT Null
SELECT RegionID, Title FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 5 AND RegionID <= 605 ORDER BY RegionID FORMAT Null

SELECT EventDate, RegionID, Title FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 4 AND RegionID <= 255 AND EventDate BETWEEN toDate('2013-06-01') AND toDate('2013-08-30') ORDER BY EventDate, RegionID FORMAT Null
SELECT EventDate, Title FROM hits_10m_single WHERE EventDate BETWEEN toDate('2013-06-01') AND toDate('2013-08-30') ORDER BY EventDate FORMAT Null
